description: Successfully updated parts of the CRM system using Typescript and React, enhancing its functionality and user experience.
Collaborated effectively with the team, demonstrating strong teamwork skills and contributing to the overall project success.
Implemented improvements to the backend using PHP, optimizing the system's performance and stability.
Showed competence and proficiency as a frontend developer, delivering high‐quality code and meeting project requirements.
Efficiently migrated the old IT dashboard to Vue.js and Node.js, improving its performance and enhancing the user interface.
Demonstrated self‐independence and proactiveness by taking the initiative to go above and beyond in resolving development issues and challenges.
Paid attention to detail, ensuring a high level of quality in the implementation and delivering a polished final product.
Aligned perfectly with the company's needs, showcasing strong adaptability and quickly integrating into the development team.
